Articles.Content:
I know Kerbolar Eclipse sounds weird, but it is technically correct.

Solar Eclipse - (Sol)ar Eclipse

Sol is the name of our particular sun in OUR stellar system

therefore

(Kerbol)ar Eclipse

Sorry if it was a bit wordy. Anyway...

Post screenies of cool Kerbolar eclipses you've seen.

Sorry for the small size.

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33690[/ATTACH]

[ATTACH=CONFIG]33691[/ATTACH]

Brought to you by the wonderful people who gave us a real, solid Kerbol. It almost makes me sad the fact the placeholder star was replaced in 0.17 and it gets so little attention to the fact. Well, besides this thread, of course.
